messages.message:
Hey team, this is a bit of enablement I need help with:
Can someone show me how I can calculate a value based on the data that extracted from a table in AIHUB?
Example: What is the total Outgoing payments of a Bank Statement based on all the transactions

• would this be table extraction?
    ◦ If it is Table Ext: How do I get all the headers in the table to have the same naming conventions?
    ◦ How can I use deterministic calculations to get to the calculated result?
• Or is this just a Reasoning Field
    ◦ But then how do I make sure it’s doing maths properly?
    ◦ Can I build a validation using the extracted fields to cross check the reasoning vs the table data?
can you provide the sample document for us to reproduce the issues you’re having with header consistency in table extraction?

Following this thread here - so once we have a sample file and requirement/ query in relation to the document, we can assess here
@Atinder @Prashant Kikani
